gemini_config.system_instruction: Create a section for my Sponsors page that explains how funding will help me dedicate more time to [project/topics], support new contributors, and ensure the sustainability of my open source work.

usage_example.python:
import google.generativeai as genai

genai.configure(api_key="YOUR_API_KEY")

model = genai.GenerativeModel(
    model_name="gemini-2.0-flash",
    system_instruction="""Create a section for my Sponsors page that explains how funding will help me dedicate more time to [..."""
)

response = model.generate_content("Your message here")
print(response.text)
